content: there are loads of little crochet baby jackets available but i couldn t find exactly what i was looking for i wanted instructions for a sleeveless baby jacket - in dk weight yarn - and written in uk terminology after lots of looking … it seemed easier in the end to write my own although i must say that there are many similar patterns freely available anyway this is my version dk yarn 8ply 4mm hook **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
